content: I'd say there is almost a 100% probability that the "good guy" will get sued. When I took my permit to carry class the instructor (a county sheriff) told us that if we even pulled our gun we were going to get sued. Both my wife and I pack. We got a million dollar umbrella insurance policy. "The price of freedom is eternal vigilance." Thomas Jefferson

content: quote: Originally posted by crackerjacks61: WOW where are all the Right Wing Gun Loving NRA Rights Extreamist on this topic? I figured they would jump all over it. One does not need to be an extremist to believe in the right to self defense. The topic of the news article has become very common in Florida. Stories of home owners and citizens using legal weapons to defend themselves against armed thugs are not uncommon. While I find it sad that people need to use lethal means for defense, I have absolutely no sympathy for the thugs who choose to terrorize our communities.
